
# The data {-} 

<p align="justify">This report maps underemployment trends for employees and self-employed workers aged 18 to 64 in the UK. We use the UKâ€™s largest study on employment circumstances, the Labour Force Survey (LFS), drawing on analysis from 2006 to 2022.</p>
